issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

same as 400+ other people see

http://developer.appcelerator.com/questions/search/kitchen%20sink%2...

same as 400+ other people see

http://developer.appcelerator.com/questions/search/kitchen%20sink%2...

i got a bit of help during todays webcast but i have now installed "1.6" and "apis 1.6" and it still doesnt work

[TRACE] E/PackageManager( 60): Package com.appcelerator.kitchensink requires unavailable shared library com.google.android.maps; failing! [TRACE] W/PackageManager( 60): Package couldn't be installed in /data/app/com.appcelerator.kitchensink-1.apk [TRACE] D/dalvikvm( 60): GC_EXPLICIT freed 6035 objects / 275648 bytes in 167ms [TRACE] D/AndroidRuntime( 308): Shutting down VM [TRACE] D/jdwp ( 308): adbd disconnected [TRACE] I/AndroidRuntime( 308): NOTE: attach of thread 'Binder Thread #3' failed [ERROR] Failed installing com.appcelerator.kitchensink: pkg: /data/local/tmp/app.apk [TRACE] Failure [INSTALL_FAILED_MISSING_SHARED_LIBRARY]

i was then told

Audience Question
Q: i've install 1.6 and apis 1.6 so where do i get the apis 1.6 with maps included ?
A: "APIs 1.6" in Developer

all i can see/install are "1.6" and "apis 1.6"

http://www.flickr.com/photos/osde-info/5333234095/

so where should i get "APIs 1.6" in Developer from ?

{html}

comments.body:
As is clear from the screenshot, user did not have Android 2.1 installed.

This ticket can be closed.
